keyword: how many calories in a saltine
title: How Many Calories in a Saltine Cracker?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a saltine cracker, including carbs, sodium, full nutrition breakdown per cracker, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Saltine Cracker?
assumptions: Standard saltine cracker (e.g., Nabisco or similar), about 4-5 g each, plain, no toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, and recipe; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One saltine cracker contains about 13 calories and 167 mg sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a saltine cracker?
faqs.a: Approximately 13 calories per standard saltine cracker.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in one saltine?
faqs.a: About 167 mg of sodium per cracker.
One saltine has around 2.3 g carbs, mostly refined flour.
Minimal, about 0.3 g total fat per cracker.

faqs.q: How do calories vary by brand?
faqs.a: Brands like Keebler or Premium are similar, but check labels for exact values.
